column4: how can i let the gnomebaker access my dvd-drive as normal user? ( /dev/sg0)
go to System > Administration > Users and Groups
Select your name from the list, click Edit, and open the Privledges tab
And then enable your user to use anything that has CD drive in it
i have checked all there it won't help. i did chgrp robert /dev/sg0 , but it did not work either
Or better yet sudo chgrp robert /dev/sd*
